They were always affectionate with you in childhood, with Kuroka always setting you in her lap while petting your ears, and Shirone sat in your lap forcing you to pet her ears.

You were always a little intimidated by Shirone. She was such a forceful person when it came to you, and she always tried to make sure you only looked at her. All your childhood friends were scared away from you because Shirone threatened them, and she threatened you into never leaving her. Even after you were all taken in by a devil and Kuroka was turned into a reincarnated devil, she still kept you to herself, using her natural strength that opposed her small frame.

None of the general devil population knew this of course, and called for you and your twin sisters heads, believing that more of devils would die if the two of you were allowed to live. This wasn't true of course, but the devil population was frightened by Kuroka's powers and pushed that hatred onto the easiest targets, you and Shirone.

You were brought to a jail cell, though the guards let you stay together due to the glare Shirone gave them. You were even set to be executed together as some show of "niceness". You, of course knew that it was just to make sure one sibling didn't lose control because the first sibling died. "Release the girl, my sister wishes to add her to her peerage" The red haired man who had spoken this was easily recognizable by appearance. After she signs the legal documents, you would belong to her and her alone, and you couldn't escape or the devils would hunt you down to finish what they started.

You were terrified of the future with Shirone as a devil. Before when she was just your twin sister, she kept everyone away and stuck to you like glue, but now that she owned you, she could keep you locked away or handcuffed to follow her around, and you couldn't say or do anything to counteract her orders.

You entered the main lobby and there was a small girl with red hair sitting there with a black haired girl. You assumed that the redhead was Lucifer's sister and your sisters new master, but you didn't know who the black haired girl was, but she was pretty. The redhead jumped to her feet when she saw your sister enter, already excited to induct the newest member of her peerage. Since she was a devil born of a pure-blood family, she already had her set of chess pieces, and only the queen piece was missing, presumably used on another person already. The red head introduced herself as Rias Gremory, and the black haired girl revealed herself as Sona Sitri, presumably the sister of the current Leviathan. Rias asked who you were when suddenly Shirone cut in, saying that that information is irrelevant. Rias looked to her brother quizzically, and he told her about the "special" arrangements between you and Shirone in exchange for her being a devil. You heard Koneko grumbling, as if annoyed by the truth of what the other girl had been saying. You, however, grew terrified at the idea of not only one girl, but multiple girls being crazy for you. Of course, talking out now would only lead to punishment so you were forced to stay quiet.

"Fine," You heard Koneko mutter out. "If It'll protect him from all the hussies that try to take him, I'll settle on sharing with the group."

It was those words that sealed your fate as what could only be described as a toy for a group of devils that all overpowered you. It was what your nightmares were made of from Kuroka's teasing about how you would be locked away but this time, it was actually going to happen.

"Great!" You heard the other girl cheerfully exclaim. "Now that we agree, my name is Akeno! Nice to meet you!"

"Likewise," Koneko muttered back. This wasn't the worst group of devils you could've been enslaved to but it certainly wasn't the best. At this point you considered the fact that you were still not handcuffed to a bed a blessing.

"Now that we know each other, it's time for some bonding!" Akeno exclaimed, before jumping into the bed on your other side. Considering the bed was only made for 2 people Akeno and Koneko were forced to hug you as close as possible. Of course, that worked great for them but not so much for you. You were completely stuck, awaiting the following morning where the news would be broken to the rest of the peerage. All you could do now is sleep...
111123.title: Peerage Deal.

1111231.content:
Eventually, you had managed to fall asleep, despite the constant fondling coming from the black-haired queen of the Peerage, Akeno Himejima. Like seriously, her hands were rubbing everywhere and there was nothing you could do about it considering how Koneko was binding your arms to your sides with her rook strength-enforced hug.

The next morning came and your situation was surprisingly very different. There were no girls to either side of you or in the room. Of course, the doors and windows seemed to be locked, an understandable thing considering you were seen as a slave, someone who held no loyalty and would try to escape at a moment's notice. The room looked the same, minus a few things out of place, not something unordinary for someone's room. You looked down at the bed and noticed a piece of paper. On it, a note to you.


Y/N, You may have noticed that I am gone, but I will be back after talking with Buchou.

I need to make arrangements to keep you safe from the various WHORES that inhibit the underground.

Please stay still, as I will be coming back with Buchou so she can see our new group possession with more detail.

-Koneko

You sigh to yourself, the note confirming that what happened last night wasn't a dream. You were going to be a boy toy for an entire peerage of powerful devils while you had no powers of note to help you escape. Not that escaping would do any good, considering the peerage leader just so happened to be the daughter of the most influential man in hell, meaning everyone would be after your skin. Just when you thought things couldn't get any worse...

A: Koneko had come back with the redhead from before in tow. The redhead starts drooling and giggling with a lewd look on her face.

B: The blue-haired girl from before who introduced herself as Sona Sitri comes in, a girl easily recognizable as the Maou Leviathan following in tow.

C: The Villa is under attack by another faction. Writers choice on which faction ends up capturing Y/N and starting a war over an adorable Neko.

11112311.content:
You sat on the bed, sighing. Your life had barreled to hell after Kuroka "Went Mad" with power, not that you thought she really did though. Regardless of what had happened, Kuroka had screwed up the happy family life between the three of you by going off and murdering her Master.

Your thoughts were interrupted by the door opening and Koneko walking in, followed by the red-haired girl who called the Lucifer 'Onii-Sama', meaning she was Rias Gremory, Sister to Lucifer and inheritor to the power of Bael. As soon as her eyes locked onto you, she started creepily giggling, not unlike an old man perving into a locker room. 'Great', you thought to yourself. 'This damned attraction power I have even worked on such a high-class devil'.

"Fufufufu, now that I have a closer look at him, he really is quite adorable. He could probably even make Serafall fall for him if they met."

"I'm only introducing you to him because we're working together to keep him away from slutty demons. Don't get any funny ideas about taking him away."

"Don't worry Koneko-Chan, I'd never think of doing that. Why, I and Akeno have shared many things from when we were young, and boys aren't an exception. I'm fine with sharing with you as well."

Despite the fact that you were only a couple feet from them, they continued nonchalantly on about how they were going to "Share" you, keep you "Safe".

You knew that the only thing they'd be doing is locking you with handcuffs to be a stress relief fuck, someone that can't reject them. After a while of talking, Rias started walking up to you and before you knew it, You were encased in a monster hug. Your face was squeezed between what was the second biggest boobs you had ever felt, second only to your older sisters pair.

You heard from above, ""I can't handle it anymore! Let me take him just for tonight, pretty please? I promise to keep him safe and hidden."


You didn't hear Koneko's response despite your enhanced hearing due to the natural noise cancelling of boobs. You had guessed the answer was a positive response, as you were suddenly hugged tighter and spun around, legs swinging in the air. You were starting to lose consciousness from lack of air in the pit, and the very last sensation you felt was your feet dropping to the ground. When you woke up...

As you told them only slightly exaggerated stories of your various victories, smiting many an evil-doer (including the likes of Bowser, Wart, Fawful and Dimentio, to name just a few), finding a large quantity of riches and rescuing a number of poor, defenseless peasants and princesses, their minds only thought more of their undying love and devotion to you. They never wanted anything to hurt you… and if something did, they’d regret it. Or if anyone else tried to take you for themselves. While they didn’t like sharing, they practically had no choice, but if anyone else dared try and win you over (without at least consulting them), there’d be consequences…

As of right then, though, you knew none of that. All you knew that perhaps you were an even greater hero than you thought, if you caught the attention of these two fair princesses!

“...and those are all the ones off the top of my head,” you finished, taking a deep breath. That’s a lot of stories to tell…

“Wow, you’re even cooler than I thought!” Daisy remarked, giggling.

“You’ve done so much for everyone… especially us…” Peach said.

“Really?” you responded. “How have I done much for either of you?”

“Well, I can see her point,” Daisy answered. “Out of all the kingdoms you’ve been in, you’ve been in ours more than most, so you’ve saved many of our people…”

“Not to mention how many times you’ve saved our kingdoms from grave danger, some of which we didn’t even know about!” Peach added.

“Yeah! Like that secret society bent on replacing us with different princesses! Neither of us knew about it, but you followed the clues and locked ‘em up!”

“And that time you figured out that Tatanga and Princess Shroob were trying to fly down here and kidnap us just by noticing their ship in the night sky! A ship that was only a purple dot! A DARK purple dot!”

“AND, in the last few baseball tournaments, you even ruined Bowser’s equipment, just because the prize money would go to kidnapping us! I mean, who does all that??”

They were almost like fangirls, enthusiastically repeating to you stories you just told them, simply because they loved them so much. Actually, they weren’t almost like fangirls, they WERE fangirls! Or… perhaps not, you thought. You figured, if they loved your stories, they probably also love-

“Not only that,” Peach continued, “but you’ve saved the world so many times! Like that time you destroyed an asteroid coming straight for us!”

“And when you-”

“Yes, yes, I know, you two, I did TELL you both,” you interjected, covering both their mouths.

...the mouths of princesses!

You quickly retracted your hands. “Uh, sorry about that.”

“Hey, it’s fine!” Daisy reassured. “We kinda owe you, anyway, considering all you’ve done, for, well, everyone… especially us!”

“Yeah!” Peach said, as if she… got an idea! “We owe you lot. We REALLY need to repay you.”
“...Yeah!” Daisy said, as if she was catching on to whatever idea Peach theoretically hatched. “In fact, you can ask us to do whatever you want, and we’ll do it!”

“Uh-huh! So, our knight in shining armor, what do you want?”

...Yeah, they’re into you. Quite a bit, too, it seems. Seriously, they’re even leaning towards you in such a way that their arms press their boobs together, which are already shown off, with all the cleavage. You even tried looking directly at them, and they either don’t notice, or don’t mind. Of course, you don’t mind, they’re PRINCESSES, and GORGEOUS, but they seem a bit… overly loving? Eh. This is a huge opportunity that you need to use.

They probably want you to ask them out or something, but you could also just flat-out ask to fuck, or do anything intimate, really. Or you could do something weird like ask them to be your slaves. Hell, they might even be into it.

Or something else, something really creative...

Or you could reject their offer…

All up to you, it seems.

(Well, first up, you wanna take up their offer? Don’t see why you wouldn’t.)
11212.title: were a wandering warrior-in-training.

choices: ...the waitress, Rosa! (Why was she so familiar?)
112121.content:
You decided to take them up on the offer because, well, why not? It could be fun, and it seems like they want you to…

...and you think you know what they want you to say. “I want you two to go on a date with me.”

They looked excited, before hugging you. Yup, this is what they wanted. You hug them both back, one arm around each of them.

“You made a good choice~” Peach said.

“Yeah, we’re gonna love you forever~” Daisy added, “and make sure no one hurts you!”

They seemed a bit… protective, but it was kinda cute! And it didn’t SEEM overkill…

“This was your plan all along, wasn’t it?” you remarked.

“...Yeah, it was,” Peach giggled, as she started to move to your lap. Daisy did the same. As a warrior, it was relatively easy for you to keep them both on one leg, holding them up with your arms.

“I mean, who could blame us? You’re such a cutie~” Daisy said.

“Alright, alright…” you said, brushing it off, keeping any concerns of spying to yourself for now. “Oh, also, is this order a one-time thing, or-”

“Nope!” Daisy cut you off. “You can basically order us to do whatever you want, and we’ll probably do it!”

“...Probably?”

“Well, we don’t want you wandering off with any other women,” Peach explained. “You’re OUR boyfriend, and we won’t allow any cheating.”

“Yeah, if any girl even looks at you funny, she’ll regret it.”

...Oh. They WERE crazy. Well, at least you can keep them under control… somewhat. Well, at least you can let all self-control go when you’re alone with them. In fact, you let your hands slide all the way down to their huge, soft asses, and they didn’t seem to mind, seeming even happier than before!

Besides, the relationship just started, they’ll probably calm down after awhile, right?

“Okay, then, where should we go?” you asked.

“Mmm, I believe that’s your decision, honey,” Peach replied, apparently already on to nicknames.

“Well, I don’t know many fancy restaurants or whatever,” you explained, “so I think suggestions would be nice.”

“Oh, there’s this great place in the town east of here, I think it’s called Goomba Gourmet, right?”

“Yes, it’s quite lovely,” Peach said. “It’s very expensive, but we;ll pay for everything, if you want~”

You shrugged. “Alright, let’s go!” You were about to get up, but Peach signalled for you to stay down while Daisy whistled.

A sports car being driven by a toad suddenly drove up, previously hidden from view. “Where do you three wanna go?”

“Goomba Gourmet, please,” Peach told her as you three got in the back, you in between them.

“Gotcha,” he responded, as he started driving there.

The princesses leaned on your shoulders, seemingly very content with the situation, while you decided to just relax and not think about how crazy they seemed, and to just enjoy having two beautiful girlfriends for the time being. You caressed them wherever you felt like doing so, and they let you, happy as can be.

~~~

“Table for three, please,” Peach ordered, and the staff quickly rushed to get you three a table, any table you wanted. The princesses picked out a booth by a window, and you three were sat down, same arrangement as the car, with you in between the princesses.

After you ordered your food, from a waitress who got no small amount of glares from your dates (and reminded you of someone, especially that name on her nametag… Rosa…), you noticed someone waving at you. It was Mayor Pauline, who you’ve rescued a couple of times. You gave her a nod back before Daisy cleared her throat.

“How the fuck do you know her?” she asked.

“...Huh?” You suddenly remembered their crazy tendencies.

“She asked how you know Pauline over there,” Peach said, sharing Daisy’s frustration.

“Well, I’ve saved her a few times while wandering New Donk City,” you explained. “I told you two, remember?”

The princesses shared a look. “I’ll go talk to her,” Peach sighed, getting up.

“Oh, you don’t have t-”

You were cut off by Daisy. “Oh, don’t worry about it.” She turned your head to hers, you now facing away from Pauline. “Now, let me show you what dating a princess is like~” She gently moved your head towards hers and pressed your lips to hers. You reciprocated the kiss as you wrapped your arms around her, unaware of what was happening between Peach and Pauline…

...After a bit, you heard Peach’s voice yet again. “Ahem.”

Daisy separated you two, both of you panting. “Sorry, I couldn’t resist, since I had such a cute face to myself~”

“Hmmph. Well, then I’ll just have to do this~” Peach leaned into you and pressed her lips to yours, and you reciprocated this new kiss, forcing Daisy in the somewhat awkward position of being next to all this. You didn’t think much of that, though, as all you could think about were Peach’s soft lips…

“...Okay, this is as long as we went,” Daisy stated, separating you two.

Peach sighed. “Fine, fine, it was fun while it lasted~” Peach winked at you. As you blushed, you noticed Pauline’s table was now empty. What did Peach-

“Food’s ready!” your waitress said, serving you three your food.

As she bent down to serve it, her low-cut uniform allowed her huge jugs to take up quite a bit of space in your vision. This happened when she served drinks and appetizers as well, which seemed to tick off the princesses.

As Daisy reached out for her food, despite the waitress trying to put it right in front of her, she seemingly accidentally knocked Peach’s water over, spilling its contents all over the waitress!

She stood still, in shock for a moment.

“Oh, I’m so sorry!” Daisy said as the waitress quickly put down the food, blushing a deep red.

“Oh, it’s fine, Princess!” the waitress assured her, nervously laughing. “I’ll just get a new uniform… and a new water…” She rushed away.

“Actually, I have to go to the bathroom first, before eating,” Peach said, getting up and going as you and Daisy chowed down.

...When Peach returned, smiling, you saw the waitress rush outside of the restaurant, seemingly upset, as she tried to cover her still-wet dress. Before you could comment, a manager rushed over to your table.

“VERY sorry about her, princesses, we had no idea she was flirting with customers!” he apologized.

...What?

“Oh, it’s fine, sir, just don’t let it happen again!” Peach forgave.

“...Yeah!” Daisy said, catching on. “How about we get a male waiter instead, just to be safe?”

“Whatever you need, princesses,” he complied, as he rushed to get one.

...Yeah, they were crazy. No doubt about it. This wasn’t something that would just blow off either, probably, they were full-blown yandere, meaning you were pretty much trapped in the relationship now. Your orders could be somewhat of a control, but they’d probably ignore them if they went against their yandere instincts of keeping you all to themselves. Hell, it was a shock they could share you amongst the two of them! You just had to live with this now.

That poor waitress, too. The spillage was obviously not an accident, and just meant to humiliate her, and possibly send a message. And then, her source of income was taken out from under her. Great.

And what happened to Pauline?

The least you could do is apologize to one of them.

You decided to wait before asking to go to the bathroom, so the timing wasn’t suspicious. It worked, as the princesses seemed none the wiser of your true intentions. As you walked away, you decided the girl you were going to search for was...

112221.content:
(In this story you're Yuuji Kazami, the MC of the show.)

Your name is Yuuji Kazami, younger brother to Kazuki Kazami and son to Ryouji Kazami and Satako Kazami. As long as you can remember you've been mistreated by your father because you weren't talented like your sister was.

You were honestly terrified of your sister. Everyone in your family listened to her, even your dad because she supplied the income for the family with her paintings. She could scold your dad and get away with it because your dad depended on her for money. She could literally molest you and you couldn't say anything against it because you know that she might get angry, and an angry Kazuki is something you would never want to see.

You just came home after playing with a new friend at the park. She was a shy girl with pink hair named Sachi. As soon as you entered the room you and Kazuki shared she asked why you were so late. You told her that you were playing with a friend, and she asked if it was a girl. You know that lying to Kazuki is always a bad idea, so you tell her the truth, which is yes. Kazuki immediately starts getting agitated which scares you.

Kazuki shouted out "Why are all your friends girls? Do you enjoy seeing me jealous? Is that it!"
"N-n-no, of course not Nee-Sama. I would never want to make you angry" You stammer out, shocked at the loudness of her voice.
"No, you wouldn't, would you? Well it's too late for that. I'm gonna take my claim on you right now to make sure you know that you belong to ME!" Kazuki adopted a grin on her face as she moved towards you, causing you to move back at the same pace. You fall backwards onto Kazuki's bed because you backed up onto it, and she follows up, landing on top of you. Since you were only ten at the time while Kazuki was eleven, her weight far surpassed the amount of weight you could lift, so Kazuki just stayed on top of you, until she _________.

A: Orders you to take you clothes off, she staking her claim now.
B: Starts hugging you tightly as she falls asleep. (Almost impossible to escape in the morning

112221.title: Yessir

1122212.content:
You lay immobile on the bed, knowing that the slightest movement would awaken Kazuki and make her finish what she started. Her grip around you was like a vice, tight enough to where you could even move your arms around. In the back of your mind, you noted the small bumps on Kazuki's chest, her body had matured at a much faster rate compared to other females her age. With that thought in your mind, you slowly drift off into sleep.....



------------------------------------------------THE NEXT MORNING------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------



You awake to the bright sunlight pouring in from your window, Kazuki's arms still wrapped around you, though to a lighter degree of strength than before. Your body was stiff from the position you were forced to sleep in by Kazuki. You remained still, taking this time to reflect on what had happened before and to think about what to do in the near future.

You look down on Kazuki's sleeping face. You recognize that many other boys your age would love to be in this position, but that's only because they don't know Kazuki's true nature as a manipulative and possessive person, you being the object of her obsession experienced both firsthand. Slowly, you start to see Kazuki stir, and immediately turn away, knowing that if Kazuki saw you staring at her while she was sleeping, you would be encouraging her obsessive nature.

It takes a moment for Kazuki to remember the events of the previous night, but when she does she looks up at you and says "Good Morning Yuuji~~"

You shudder at the expression of delight on her face, before responding "G-good morning Kazuki."

Kazuki paused for a second, before asking "You'll always stay with me, right Yuuuuuji?"

The question had caught you by surprise, but you knew that if you didn't answer positively, Kazuki would be livid
"O-of course Kazuki"


Kazuki then told you something you weren't expecting. "___________________________"

C: "Take a shower with me Yuuji, I need to let off some steam" (The kiss scene in the shower from the anime, or maybe something more)

1122221.content:
Your name is Jaune Arc, the heir to the Arc line, a family of prestigious warriors. You were trained regularly in swordsmanship so you could represent the family, and it started to show in your body. Girls around your age always blushed when you passed by with either a tight shirt or no shirt at all. Being shirtless even caused you to gain a fanclub in your hunter training school. One day the teacher sent the classroom home with news. "We will be visiting Schnee headquarters in Atlas tomorrow so you can learn more about how dust is made for your futures. Be sure to get your form signed by then to go." The teacher then handed out said form before releasing you all to go home.

You arrive home and luckily enough, it seems both your parents are home at the same time, which is rare since they're both high level hunters. "Welcome home Jaune!" you hear them both call out, before responding back with your own "I'm back".
You walk up to your mother and show her the form, and she reads it to herself silently, before signing in her portion and going to your father, asking him to sign it too. Your father spots something your mother did not, which is a slight line of text that is barely noticable in the contract.

-If the Schnee family should get interested in a student, they are allowed to take them into their house from their families without consent-

Your father, still against the possibility of you being taken away, refuses to sign the paper and saying that you just have to stay home. Your mother turns to you and tells you that she would convince your dad to let you go, and you trust her, before going into the backyard to train. After a couple hours of training you go in for dinner, your mother handing you back the fully signed form, telling you to have fun during your visit, but to stay safe. You finish dinner and wash your plate, before going upstairs to bed to watch some DustTube before going to bed, the excitement of going to the Schnee headquarters taking over your mind.

The next morning!

You wake up in the morning, feeling more refreshed than ever before. Your parents had already left for their daily mission and your sisters were still sleeping, leaving you to say goodbye to no one as you exited your house for the last time, not that you knew at the time...

You arrive at school on time, and the teacher is accepting the forms early. You hand in your form before getting on the bus to the airport so you could fly on a Dust Plane over to Atlas. After waiting about 20 minutes, more people start to get on the bus, taking up all the seats. You pull out your scroll to listen to some music in your earbuds while the bus starts moving. The entire trip took a little less than 2 hours, the distance between Vale and Atlas being quite short. You start to feel cold before pulling out the coat you bought before you came, already knowing of Atlas's extreme weather.

You and your classmates start to leave the airport at your teachers orders, once again boarding another bus. The bus brings you to Schnee headquarters, which you note is quite warm, hot even. You take off both your jacket and your shirt, leaving you only in a sweat shirt, and causing all the female students of your grade to start staring at you and, unknown to everyone else, a certain Ice princess was staring as well. You feel a piercing stare unlike any you had ever felt before coming from the higher area of the facility before dismissing it, believing it to only be your nerves.

Weiss POV

I must have him, he must be mine! He must only belong to me! Everything that is good belongs to me! Everything that I want belongs to me and I WANT HIM! I saw those sluts acting like they're attractive, trying to show off curves that don't exist to try to impress my blond knight. Of course, he ignored those sluts because he knew he should only look at me that way.

I suddenly start remembering about a certain clause in the contract to come here that I was interested in before. -If the Schnee family should get interested in a student, they are allowed to take them into their house from their families without consent-. I immediately knew that father could take my beautiful blond knight into our house, to be a slave, pet, or perhaps a lover for me.

Back to Second POV

You suddenly shiver, even though it's super hot inside the facility. You started to notice an arguably pretty white themed girl following the group around, and you assume it's Weiss Schnee, heiress of the Schnee company, due to her easily noticeable traits.

What happens?

A: Suddenly, an "attack" on the Schnee family ends up with you being kidnapped. (Staged attack to kidnap you)
B: Suddenly, a real attack on the Schnee family by the White Fang ends with you being kidnapped (Yandere Blake Belladona)
C: You are kidnapped quietly while you got lost from the group, leaving no commotion whatsoever

Today’s the day, you've prepared the mixture, you've made sure no one else is in the store and you've combed yourself well. Today is the day you make Mirajane Strauss Yours. She's been coming into you fresh fruit store for a couple of months. You recognised her from the photoshoots in Sorcerers Magazine. With her beauty it wasn't surprising that you fell for her. That mixture you mentioned before is actually a love potion, designed to make her fall in love with the first person she sees. Aka. You

Suddenly your thoughts are interrupted as you see the Fairy Tail mage enter. She was in her classic red dress, her long whit hair dropping over her and carrying a small basket. She was beyond gorgeous.

“Uh Hi Mirajane. Nice seeing you today” You say trying to act nice and cool. Mirajane not being the kind of girl to ignore someone walked closer to you.

You blush at the compliment as you try not to make it too awkward. “Uh thanks, just trying to put on a good look.”

“Well, i must say its working” She said as you almost melted from the compliment. “Anyway, I'm going to just buy some Yognive Apples is that alright”

“Actually, can you do me a favour first” You ask her as she looks your way, ears open as you grab the cup with the love potion. “Ive been thinking about extending my branch and make fruit shakes. However i don't know how good they are so-

“So you want me to be the first one to taste them?” She asked as you nod. “Well i would love to” She said smiling.

“Of course, it would be my honour.” She put the basket on your desk and reached for the cup, bringing it up to her nose as she sniffs it. “Hmmm. Smells good, whats in it exactly?”

“Uhh... thats a secret” You say figuring it would be better to not tell her. Then to your absolute delight she took a small sip of the potion. She brings it away from her plush lips as she savours the taste.

“So Mirajane... how was it?” You ask with the stupidest smile on your face. She opens her eyes to reply, however stop when she sees you. You cheer in your brain as you recognise that look. Its the look you give her all the time.

Mirajane then gave you a loving smile before saying. “It was really good, really good”

Your name was Y/N and you were an incubus, the male version of a succubus. The thing is, you had always been terrible at controlling your pheromones which tended to "enchant" almost all of the females around you unless they had some sort of resistance. Most would say that would be beneficial to your cause, that being to take the sexual energy from races, but you were a shy boy, much too shy to take advantage of a girl affected by your pheromones.

You had been homeschooled most of your life because your parents knew that if you had gone to a human elementary school you would almost certainly be discovered. You dreaded the day that you would become old enough to go to Yokai Academy because you knew for certain that your parents would send you there when you had become old enough.


The very day you had become old enough for high school your parents enrolled you for the next year and told you to get everything ready. On the fateful day of September 5th, you had all but been kicked out of the house and told to get on the bus that arrived for you. You had gone on the bus and jumped in fright at the creepy bus driver. The bus driver let out a cackle before remarking, "Ha, they weren't kidding. You really do have strong Pheromones. I can only wish you the best this year, hopefully, no strong monsters take interest in you, ha!"

With that ominous warning, the bus driver stopped talking and gestured to you to go sit. You had chosen to sit as far away from the bus driver as you could. The bus ride had been fairly peaceful aside from the other boy that had entered the bus. With your highly sensitive nose, you could tell he was a human, but at the same time you felt a bit of monster in him, so you assumed he was some kind of Male Witch.

After a stressful bus ride, you ran out of the bus at nearly the same time the Human did, running into the forest to rush to school. What happened?

A: You bump into a light blue haired Succubus. You notice that your pheromones had already done their work and made her obsessed.
B: You make it to school without issue, but it seems your presence in the class caused the lesson to be disrupted by all the girls swooning over you.
C: You bump into a Pink Haired girl with amazing power, though you could tell it had been sealed somehow. You hoped it could stay that way because a powerful monster that's also a girl could spell your life in a dungeon.

As you were rushing to school you were stopped by the sight of a blue-haired girl standing completely still in front of you. Since she had come from behind a corner you ran straight into her and knocked her down. After a second of both of you groaning you heard a yell come from the girl beneath you. She screamed "What the he-" before she suddenly stopped.

You looked down to see what had happened and noticed a familiar look in her eyes similar to people you had accidentally charmed before. You smelt a familiar type of Pheromone exuding from the girl beneath you, showing that she was a succubus. Although most succubi are trained to resist Pheromones from all kinds of monsters it had seemed like this girl hadn't.

You were mostly relieved at the revelation of her race. You could've run into much worse races, including Vampires or Werewomen. You were semi-combat trained so a succubus probably wouldn't be much of an issue to fend off if worst came to worse.

As you were thinking these thoughts the girl in blue hair was thinking something opposite to what she usually thought of. When she came to this school she had planned on making every single boy fall in love with her but when she met you all thoughts of that went out the window and all she could think about was locking you up in chains to a bed so that you would be together forever.

You shake your head, "No, it's nothing. I'm fine."
"No youre not," her suspicions grew as she leaned over to you, "I can detect very stressed emotional readings emitting from you. What is wrong?"

She wanted an answer and was not willing to budge until she got it. It's not like you could just flat out tell her that you dont feel cool being drafted against your will by robots and being made to serve one that knows TMI about YOU! But something told you that you couldnt flat out give her a bullshit answer, because she might see right through it.
Perhaps it would be best to give her a partial truth. Something you'd think someone like her would understand.

"Well..." you swallowed, "to tell the truth, ma'am..." You got up out of your seat and looked her in the eye, "I've been feeling very lonely lately."
"Lonely?" Iris's interests sparked.
"I mean, ever since more and more of your... of Repliforce's military cruised into my town, quite a bit of neighbors have moved away (or disappeared) and I've been seeing less and less... fellow humans around lately."
"I see..."
"In fact, it's been a few weeks since I've seen another human being around where I live. Seriously, all my neighbors are now robots. And now I've been drafted into an army full of robots. I feel like I'm half the planet away from home."
Your robot commanding officer just stared silently throughout your entire rant. You couldnt tell if she was offended by your statement, cuz her facial expression was unreadable. Still, thinking twice about you said, you felt a little bad.

"I'm sorry, ma'am," you bowed your head in apology, "I dont mean any offense by it. It's... just an experience I'm not very used to.” Surprisingly, you felt quite a bit better getting that off your chest. As if a huge nasty weight just got lifted off your back. Could THAT be the real problem you were having?! Were you really just upset with being lonely instead of being kidnapped?!

Whatever it was, the butterflies in your belly flew right out of it and you didnt feel quite as nervous of Iris's blank yet attentive stare.

“I… I understand,” she finally responded, “it must be difficult being away from your own kind for a while.” More like your own kind being away from you, but nonetheless. “It's true that us reploids are quite a bit different from you. In quite a lot of ways, it'd take several hours to list the many differences. However, despite us being more machine than organic, we do share a few similarities. We both communicate to each other eloquently, speak the same language, we can engage in the same past times and activities as you. We have emotional impulses that make us happy, sad, angry, frightened, and hundreds of other emotional responses like you.”

Iris stepped a bit closer and continued, “And of course, just like you humans, us reploids have families. Although I cannot recollect any history regarding my 'biological' parents, I at least have my brother… who is incredibly important to me. Just like how Mr. Hochrin is important to you… despite not being your biological father.” Aw shoot. She's got a point. Reploids actually having families, let along family bonds, was a major trait that they have in common with humans. Now bearing children on the other hand… well, you heard from hearsay that some have particular 'upgrades', but it's still just hearsay.

But before your mind could drift on that anomaly, Iris grabbed your hand and held it gently. Hm. It felt very soft and warm… like actual human skin instead of cold hard metal! Just the touch of her hand alone reminded you of her hug earlier. Honestly, you were surprised her breasts her soft and cushiony just like a human's! You were expecting those things to be hard as steel and nearly poking your eyes out! Heh.

“Dont worry, you'll fit in with us,” she assures you with a wink, “it's not like any of the others can tell youre a filthy fleshbag, anyways.” Her words combined with her touch really soothed your woes. It really took your mind off the database and whatever this damn thing her brother put around your neck is! Maybe. Just maybe. It wont be so bad.

Feeling a new boost of confidence, you return Iris's smile and give your commanding officer the proper salute.
“Thank you, ma'am! I'll do my best to serve you!”

“You'll do your best to ASSIST me,” she corrects you, “please dont think of me as your boss.”
You nodded, “Yes ma...I mean Iris.”

With that out of the way, Iris put her hands behind her back and peeked at your work.
“Speaking of which, having you finished doing the task that I assigned you?” Oh right, the whole report piling... er... DID you finish it?
11222222222222123.title: More Human Than Human

choices: "I guess I could go for a nature walk..."
"Sorry, I'm not feeling up for it."
112222222222221233.content:
You certainly did finish the report piling a while ago. It wasnt even difficult because about 99% of the reports in the stack were something you personally approved of. All but 2 papers were on the approval list!

Iris stared blankly at the insanely large stack of reports you deemed worthy of her approval.
"Um... THIS whole pile is what you believe I should approve?" she seemed a bit suspicious at first which was understandable.
But you nodded fully assured of yourself, "Absolutely ma-" Iris pointed at you with her eyebrows raised, "I mean Iris! These are all reform proposals and requests for federal funding that I personally think my city is in desperate need of. I honestly think they'll help it heal and recover back to it's former glory before the whole Maverick outbreak. We need all the help we can get."

She saw determination in your eyes and her CPU believed it was enough to warrant considering your opinion.

Your reploid superior nodded.

"Very well [Y/N]," she walked back over to her desk, "let's have a look at them, shall we?"

And that's when the fucking evaluation began. It was an evaluation that hinted that this was gonna be a LOOOOOOOOOOONG conscription service.

Iris looked over the first proposal.
"Request for four million dollars of federal funding to build a memorial monument?"
"To honor those who died in the Four Kings' War," you added, remembering your father's service (and Iris's whole database, "they never got properly honored for their service. Some of them didnt even get a proper burial. I'm sure their friends and families would really appreciate the sentiment."
"They truly do deserve such admiration," Iris admits, "from what I researched, it was described as 'Hell Split Wide Open' for a reason." She tapped the paper against her desk, "However, Repliforce has already arranged plans to include a special exhibit dedicated to the war in the Repliforce-Approved National History Museum over in City Square. So this monument is not needed."
"Still... I think the townsfolk here would appreciate it...."
"They will appreciate the many sights, stories, names, scenes, and Repliforce memorial souvenirs our History Museum will provide them when they attend," Wow. WOW. To say that with such a straight face. You have no words! "I'm sorry, [Y/N], but this funding request will have to be denied. I'm putting this into my denial pile." And so she put it in her denial pile.

*Bzzzzzz*

And by her 'denial pile', she means her bin with the shredder. Ouch.
"Next, please."

"Er...sure..." you hand her the next one, "a request to fund more public transportation."
"Oh! Repliforce is the process of building a high-speed bullet train system for your city. It should be completed by the end of the year."
"I dont think a lot of us can wait that long. After the whole car-hacking debacle during the Outbreak, very few people even have a car anymore. We need more buses to get around."
"I'm afraid that's out of the question. Far too many state-approved buses have failed Repliforce's hack-proof tests and the ones that do are outside of our budget. But not to worry. I read that walking more is good for a human's health and carpooling is good for the environment, not to mention very socially friendly. So this will have to go into my denial pile as well."
*Bzzzzz* Into the denial pile it goes.
"Next, please."

"Um... a request for funding to build more public schools."
"Repliforce has already provided those." Right. THEIR approved schools.
"Uh..." you needed to rephrase that, "more like schools... uh... run and taught by US... OUR teachers and staff."
"Unnecessary," she immediately rejects the idea, "Repliforce approved teachers are highly skilled and highly educated that have graduated with highest honors at other Repliforce-approved schools! Yours truly, included," she pats her chest with pride, "So for the good of your kind's future generations, this request will be going in my denial pile." *Bzzzzz* "Next, please."

"Errm... a proposal to reopen and restore the mega mall... that Repliforce is currently using as a base of operations," you hand her the paper and she doesnt take long to read it.
"I'm sorry, but our glorious leader has already arranged plans for that place," she states, "but not to worry. Repliforce is currently building a colossal mega mall completely filled with Repliforce-approved stores, merchandise vendors, kiosks, and food courts to serve your every need! It's sure to be our finest civilian commercial complex yet!"
"Great..." you smile nervously as you watch that paper go through the denial bin and come out a million denied shreds.
"Next, please."

It went on from there.
"A proposal to rebuild the Diamond Gate Bridge."
"Repliforce has already built a bridge. It doesnt need another."
"But it has a very strict security checkpoint every 500 feet. It takes nearly four hours to finally finish crossing it!"
"Repliforce Rule #759: Safety Always Comes Before Convenience. *Bzzzz* Next, please."
"A request for funding to repave downtown's cracked and destructed streets."
"There is currently a shortage of available construction equipment and asphalt material due to it being used for other specific purposes. As soon as those purposes are fulfilled, we will look into street paving." *Bzzzz* "Next, please."
"A proposal to negotiate an agreement and timeline to withdraw Repliforce forces-"
*BZZZZZZZZZ*
"Next, please."

Time passes and a total of ZERO requests and proposals have met Iris's approval and been spared from the shredder. Each and every one rejected and shredded. More public housing? Repliforce already has those. *Bzzz*. More forest reserves? The reploidal replicas suffice. *Bzzz*. Lifting the 'temporary' restrictions on meat exports? Repliforce's Department of Agriculture knows what's best. *Bzzz*
“Uh...Iris? There was another proposal behind that one you just shredded.”
“Oh? Well I'm sure it wasnt important.”
“It was involving Repliforce prison reform.”
“As I said. Wasnt important.”

The more papers were shredded, the lower your morale sunk. Despite Iris being awful cute and awful warming, she seemed outrageously faithful to her employers. Maybe you cant comprehend such behavior because you cant think like a machine create solely to serve said company that built it. Still, it made you so incredibly uneasy. Your woes were starting to come back.

After what seemed like the longest 20 minutes of your life, Iris had finally finished her evaluation. You can probably guess how many requests and proposals were accepted.

“Wow! We've got all that done in half the time it normally takes doing it by myself!” your reploid superior beams with a bit of glee, “brother was right. Tasks get done far quicker with an assistant.”
“G...reat...” you say, still reeling from the blow to the belly of your morale.

Iris then looked over to the clock.
“We've finished so much earlier than expected, I still have a few hours of free time left before my scheduled meeting with a representative of the Maverick Hunters.” The 'MH' works quickly get your attention. However, any and all ideas involving them would have to be put on the back burner for the time being.

“Since we have a lot of time to spare, how about I show you around?” she offered, “we've provided a plethora of entertainment ideal for tourism!” She sounded like she was advertising Repliforce to you! “The Repliforce Megaplex just opened up and it's currently playing a few really amazing state-approved foreign movies. I can reserve us a private screening with the really comfy seats!”
“Um...”
“Or if you'd like...” Iris added, “...we can go on a brief nature walk to clear our heads… at one of our artificial forest reserves. Sure, the trees and wildlife are animatronic, but theyre very convincing replicas, you'll hardly even notice the difference... other than the animals being 100% safe for human contact, of course!”

Again you felt the soft warm grasp of her surprisingly realistic hand grasp yours. Tight, but slightly soothing. Shaking off the brief moment of ease, you answer...
112222222222221233.title: Big Sister Is Watching You

choices: Colonel, who was now more concerned about you than for his sister
Layer, who was also Yandere for you
Iris, who was ready to take you to your new home
Cinnamon, who claimed she was there to give you a health checkup
1122222222222212332.content:
"I guess I could go for a nature walk..." You replied.

Iris nodded and hugged you. After a few moments, she said, "Let me leave a message and then we'll be off."

So she typed away. Typed for longer than a simple message.

A little bit later, the two of you stepped off the Repliforce civilian bus. Iris happily sighed as she hugged your arm and placed her head on your shoulder.

The walk was pretty nice. As she said, there was artificial trees and animals.

You didn't like how every once in while the animals paused to look at you. Too many tales of zoos, parks, and the like where Robots went maverick and killed people.

None of the animal were aiming any weapons, claws or anything harmful at you. They just stared.

Had you known she had programmed the animals to take footage of you, you would have been calmer.

Then again, maybe not. You might've found that scarier than animals attacking you.

Several Repliforce workers showed up at your apartment and Iris's, packed up all the stuff, and brought it to a large apartment. One robot worker made sure to place a box in the center of the living room that was labeled '[Y/N]'s 'pornography'. All according to Iris's orders.

After an hour of walking, Irs asked, "I really enjoyed this walk. I almost hope that this would never end."

"Yeah, there's your meeting with the Maverick Hunters..." you said, hoping she'd let go of your arm.

Iris took her head off your shoulder as she said, "Yes, we should be getting back, so I can prepare for the meeting. Heh..."

"What's so funny?" You asked.

"Oh, nothing. Just that I bet a hunter I kind of know might be disappointed that I now have my eyes on someone else. I just find it funny for some reason," Iris replied as she brought you to the bus stop.

"Oh okay..." you replied, wondering if you would need to keep an eye out for Maverick hunters in the future. "So what will I do in the mean time?"

"Just wait for me in my office. The meeting will be a short one, only two or three hours long," Iris answered as you both stepped onto the bus.

===

As you waited in her office, you looked around. You looked at a few pictures on her desk. One was of her and her brother. Two were of you and seemed innocent, but they were ones of you taken without your knowledge.

You looked at her terminal and pondered if you should call for help. But before you could, you heard knocking. The door opened up and it was..
1122222222222212332.title: a brief walk in the park

choices: Your overall experience working with Repliforce.
Your personal opinions on certain reploids.
11222222222222123324.content:
In walked a young blonde girl in the blue and white nurse outfit/armor and matching nurse's cap/helmet with big green eyes that brought to you two separate and conflicting inquiries. One is that she too is not human, she's a reploid just like all the others... leaving you feeling a little more lonesome. Two is that you recognize this particular reploid. You recall her seeing her pop up several times during your volunteering jobs. She was there assisting the emergency medical staff, treating the wounded and the ill, as well as comforting the uh... soon-to-be widows, widowers, and orphans. It wasnt a task you had the emotional willpower to fulfill, so for someone like her to be routinely accomplish such a task with such a cheerful tone deserves admiration!

"Hi Cinnamon," you greeted her while attempting to hide the uneasiness from your facade. It was the least you could do for someone as strong-willed as her.

"Good afternoon, Mr. [Y/N]," she smiled and bowed, "I'm sorry if I disturbed you."

"No, you didnt disturb me at all," you were already disturbed long before she walked in, "what do you need?"
"I'm here to administer your routine health checkup," Cinnamon answers, "Repliforce requires all staff to receive their health examination to ensure Maverick virus prevention." She had you up until that last part.
"...Maverick virus prevention?" you squinted your eyes, "even me?"
"Especially you," she assures you, "though there's no existing report of any humans infected as of yet, the Maverick virus strains have been mutating over time and Professor Isoc theorizes that it's only a matter of time before it affects human immune systems as well." Add that to the ever-growing list of oddities that wont help you sleep at night!

"Er, ok, sure thing," youre awfully quick to comply, "the last thing I want is to become a Maverick. Uh, no offense?"
"Why would I be offended?"
"Nevermind. Sorry, it's just an expression that sounded better in my head." Luckily for you, Cinnamon paid your rude, out of line choice of wording no mind whatsoever. Instead, she happily focused all her energy on your checkup.

The checkup itself wasnt that uncomfortable, either. Her chest doubled as a tool organizer which she'd pop open to pull out a random tool for testing, then take notes. She pulled out a tongue depressor, put it in your mouth then took a note. She pulled out a thermometer, put it in your mouth, took a note. She pulled out a stethoscope, slipped it under your shirt and felt your heartbeat (her hands were awful cold by the way), then took a note. She checked your ear temperature, took a note, tested your reflexes, took a note, tested your blood pressure, took a note, nothing really out of the ordinary outside of the fact that it was a smiling fembot that's administering all this.

All it all, the checkup wasnt so bad.
...That is until THAT part of the checkup came. You know the one.

“Ok, Mr. [Y/N]. Would you please turn your head to the side?” Cinnamon wasted no time whatsoever to reach for your pants!
You quickly backed away in surprise… and out of fear where those ice cold titanium steel hands are gonna be!
“Er… i… is t-this really… appropriate?” you cringe nervously, “I-I-I mean… well, that part of a human's body is incredibly… sensitive… and well… reploids naturally have super strong grips!”
“Please dont be nervous. Having the necessary gentle grip to administer proper hernia examinations are requirements for nurse units,” Cinnamon assures you, “just relax and this will all be over really quick.”

You took a deep breath and swallowed hard, “O-o-ok.” Hoping for the absolute best, you unzip and pull down your pants and allow the reploid nurse slip her awful cold hand in your boxes and you try your best to think happy thoughts as you felt the icy cold grip surround your extra-sensitive man-pouch!

“Now please cough.”
*Cough* You coughed.
“A little harder this time.”
*Cough!* you cough harder.
“One more time. Cough really hard for me.”
*COUGH!*
“Good.”

You breathe a sigh of relief when her super-strong titanium steel hand leaves your boxers! You pray she doesnt plan on administering a prostate exam next!

Cinnamon scribbles another note. “Alright, now to check on that collar of yours.” The collar?! That thing the Colonel had put around your neck?! The one that he wouldnt tell you what it did… but hinted that it wouldnt be good for you if you didnt take good care of his sister?! THAT collar?!

The nurse pulled a remote out from her chest container and pushed a few buttons. Your collar immediately lit up and made several beeps and buzzing noises. Your curiosity sparked, but you dare not try anything funny as she removed a plate covering and inspected the wiring.

“Hmm,” she hummed as she observed, “no signs of any faulty circuity or short fusing. That's good. No trace of any warranty tampering, that's for sure. Oh wow, I havent seen a battery with THAT many milliamps in one of these before! I bet I could charge my laptop with this thing if I tweak it a little!”
“So… the collar's in good shape?” you randomly blurt out.
“So far,” she comments, “I still dont understand why such a thing is placed on Repliforce faculty.” Spark goes your curiosity.
“Oh?”
“Usually these particular collars are reserved for higher leveled prison or asylum inmates released to the public on parole.”
“What exactly are they supposed to do?” you finally ask the million dollar question.
“Specifically, these collars keep the parolees within their designated state-approved territory. Theyre not only trackable via satellite surveillance, but theyre also programmed to recognize specific areas and boundaries that the wearer can and cannot cross.” Interesting. Ooph, but interesting.

“And what happens if they go over the boundaries?” you gots to know, “they get shocked or something?”
“No. It'll give off an alarm that'll alert any and all nearby Repliforce personnel that youre breaking parole.” Oh. “However it IS programmed to discharge high voltage if it detects unapproved tampering.” OUCH! “So unless you feel the urge to be fried crispy, I wouldnt recommend trying to take it off.”

Shit. Why in the world would these tin cans feel the need to put one of THESE on you?! What's next? Are they gonna break your ankles so you dont try to run away like in that one movie starring that heavyset woman Nicholas Cage punched in the face in that other movie?!

"Uh... would it be safe to take a bath in this thing?" you ask.
"Of course," Cinnamon answers, "the casing is 100% completely waterproof. Even if youre caught in a monsoon, this collar will not short-circuit.” Youre really starting to regret going down this line of conversation. But at least you finally got answers to some nagging questions from the beginning. However, more question brew: What are the restricted boundaries the Colonel and his cronies set for you? Where can you go or not go? Why did they feel the need to put a parole collar on you to begin with? How do you get the stupid parole collar off without being electrocuted to death?

And those were only a FEW of the many, MANY questions brewing in your mind ever since the consciption began. Sadly, those will have to wait for another time. Until then, you can at least get one particular question answered.

"Alright, does that include the checkup?" you asked.

"Almost," Cinnamon answers, "I just have a brief line of questioning I need you to answer that I need to assess and evaluate before I can conclude the examination." Oh goodie. A pop quiz. "I'm gonna ask you a variety of questions and I need you to answer them as truthfully as possible, ok? Dont be afraid to be as brutally honest as you can."

"Ok," you comply with the questionnaire. It sounded easy, but you were sure it wasnt.
And you were right because of what this series of questions related to!
Speaking of questions, here's one: What were the questions she asked you related to?
11222222222222123324.title: The Cinnamon Challenge

choices: Iris came back from her meeting a little early!
112222222222221233243.content:
As if having your vulnerable exposed genitalia at the mercy of a reploid's cold strong grip didnt make you uneasy enough. Cinnamon's line of questions felt very unorthodox and way too personal, that if you believe your kind's military used it in their recruit interviewing, they'd be sued back to the dark ages!

But your options were limited. You had no choice but to answer them. Truthfully, cuz for all you know, Cinnamon had a lie-detector built into her CPU and is transmitted directly to the higher ups. Especially one particular higher up.

"First question," she reads off the questionnaire, "describe your marital status. Married, Single and Divorced, or Single and Never Married?"
"Single and Never Married," you answered. She took a note.
"If your answer is 'Single and Never Married', are you currently in a relationship with anyone? Yes or No?"
"No," you answered. She took another note.
"If your answer is 'No', is there someone you are currently interested in having a relationship with anyone? If Yes, please give his/her name." That's WAY too personal.
But you answer "No." But that wasnt specific enough.
" 'No' as in you dont currently have someone youre interested in or 'No' as in you DO have someone youre interested in, but refuse to give his/her name?"
"No as in there isnt currently someone."
"Thank you," Cinnamon scribbles a few more notes.

It got worse from there.
"Ok, these next questions are very important," Cinnamon explains, "please listen very carefully and do not hesitate to ask me to repeat them or reword them if you dont understand a question clearly."
"Ok," you answer nervously.

"First questions," she reads, "which of the following describes you? Straight, Homosexual, Bisexual, or Other?" Other? "If the answer is 'Other' please describe."
"Straight," thankfully it was an easy question. OFFENSIVE, but easy.
"Ok then," Cinnamon's tone lights up a little as she jots down a note, "next question: what part of a female's body would you consider gives you the most sexual stimulus? A female's chest or a female's hips?" GOOD LORD ALMIGHTY!
"Is that seriously part of the questionnaire?" you question.
"Yes it is," she answers with no hesitance, "Chest or Hips?"
You took a deep breath as your face went red, "...Hips." A man of class.

"Alright," she takes a slightly long note, "next question: which of the following would you consider to be an ideal girlfriend? Human, Reploid, or Other? If the answer is 'Other' please describe." The bloody hell kind of question is that?!
"Other," you answer, "I dont think it really matters if she's a human or reploid."
"Interesting," she comments as she jots down notes, "next question: would you consider having a relationship with a co-worker? Yes or No?"
"Uh... that would depend on how well we-"
"That's not one of the choices," she interrupts, "the choices are yes or no."
You sigh hard, "Yes.... I guess?"
"Nice," she remarks before jotting down a note, "please pay close attention to this next question: In the unlikely event that you and your co-worker were trapped in a tight dangerous confined space with no hope of escape or being rescued, would you consider making love to your co-worker before you and her inevitably die? Yes or No?" This is getting ridiculous. But whatever! Fine!
You shrug your arms, "I guess... if SHE'S up for it too... yes, probably."

Oh she wasnt done.
"How often would you say you relief personal stress via self-stimulation on an average week?"
You squinted your eyes, "I'm sorry, I dont understand the question."
"Allow me to rephrase it," Cinnamon quickly rephrased it, "how often do you masturbate per week?"
Keeping a straight face, you politely ask, "Can I please skip that question?"
"I'm sorry, all these questions are mandatory according to strict Repliforce guidelines," Cinnamon explains, "if you need more time to properly answer, feel free to take it."

You didnt need more time. You had an answer.
You lower your head and answer, "3 to 4 times a week, I guess..." Tsk. Liar.

"Hm," Cinnamon's 'hm' sounded a little more interested than it shouldve been! "Next question: If you were offered, would you be interested in routine assistance with self-stimulation from a third party?"
"NO THANK YOU," seriously, who wrote this crap?!

"Well then, we're down to the final question," she states. FINALLY.
"What?" you groan with irritation.
"Is the ability to produce future offspring important to you? Yes or No?" WOW. That's a pretty head scratching question right there. Not to mention, it's something you gotta take into account while youre your commanding officer's boyfriend...
You take a few breathes, having a difficult time coming up with an answer, "Well... at the moment... hm. That's a tough question to answer."
"Feel free to take your time," she insists.
You glance around, bite your lip, inhale and exhale, and at the very end, youre sure there was only one answer, "...To be frank, I probably would like to have children eventually. I gotta say the answer's yes."

Cinnamon doesnt respond. She just takes notes. She takes a lot of notes actually. She writes for almost a whole minute and you just sit there and wait patiently for her to finish. Penny for her thoughts, but you got a feeling you dont wanna know what she's thinking.

"Alright. That concludes the examination," Cinnamon FINALLY ends this bizarre episode, "thank you so much, Mr. [Y/N] for your patience and compliance."
"N...no problem," it was hard to say that with a straight face. The blonde reploid nurse extends her hand and you willingly shake it, taking note of the cold, rather stiff mechanical grip. Quite unlike Iris's warm gentle humanlike grip. You'll assume that her chest isnt similar to Iris's, either.

"I should return to my post. Here is my card," she hands you a business card. An 'Isoc Pharmaceuticals (a Repliforce partner)'s business card with her name, company address, and phone number on it, "if you had any questions or concerns, or if you simply feel the need to talk, feel free to call me. Use the phone number on the back if it's after hours." Her PERSONAL phone number was written on the back of it!

"Thank you again for your cooperation," Cinnamon bowed, "I hope to see you again soon!"
"Thank you," you bowed back, "bye Cinnamon." With that, the perky professional (but slightly disturing) nurse left the office. You sighed hard after finally getting some well earned peace and quiet.

Unusual, but at least you had SOME answers. It didnt make your forced conscription any easier to manage, though.

Ugh... all this drama is making you tired. You were nearly worn out. Maybe a little nap will ease your stress. Feeling that was the case, you lean back in your chair and close your eyes.


...For about as long as a SECOND cuz something interrupted that nap before it could even start! What was the interruption?
112222222222221233243.title: 'Strictly Confidential', my ass...

112222222222222.content: What about this lovely lass?
112222222222222.title: Shantae from... Shantae

choices: "Let's have our date here. Besides, there's a cave entrance nearby."
"Alright. There's a restaurant in ScuttleTown that I love!"
"Does this rag smell like Chloroform to you?"
1122222222222221.content:
You are Y/N, You work various odd jobs as you traveled around Sequin Land, as you are orphan.

You had recently arrived at Scuttletown when you were working with a construction team. The town had been attacked by Pirates.

As you worked to help repair, you saw a beautiful sight.

A purple-haired woman, dressed in a red Genie's outfit... and from what you heard, she was a half-genie who was the town's Genie Guardian that fought off the Pirates.

So you decided on staying, wanting to be with Shantae.

Carrying a bouquet of flowers and a few boxes of Bentos ( you heard they were her favorite), you headed to her home, which was the town's lighthouse.

You knocked and she answered, saying, "Hello. May I help you?"

"Well, I came to give you these, since you are a hero and I wanted to give you a reward... " You said as you offered the flowers and Bento. "I know you probably got a lot of rewards and gifts for being a great Genie Guardian and being so attractive..."

As she accepted the flowers and Bento, Shantae quietly said, "Actually, you're the first to give me any gifts and the first to tell me that I'm attractive without being a bad guy or Rottytops..."

"Oh..." You uttered, not sure what to say.

"I'd ask you if you wanted a date with me, but since you are leaving with that construction team-" Shantae began, sadly looking away.

Normally, NPC's wouldn't be allowed near the top of the tower, but you were given special permission from the Goddess herself, Purple Heart or, as she preferred for you to call her, Neptune.

It all happened one day when you were working your boring job in a cubicle among the many floors when Purple Heart in her human form skipped into the room. The atmosphere had tightened as everyone moved to make themselves look busy and competent.

"I'm honored my lady, I would be glad to accept" As you spoke those words, you saw Purple Hearts eye's light up in glee, before she jumped and encircled her legs and arms around your chest. She was quite a bit smaller then you in her human form, so it didn't take much effort to hold her up, but the major issue was two things. One, literally everyone on the floor was glaring at you, and two, your brain had literally been on the verge of shutting down due to the feeling of the Goddesses "peaks" on your chest.

Purple Heart stayed attached, leaving everyone in an awkward silence, before you decided to break that silence. "Lady Purple Heart? Is everything alright?"

You felt Purple Heart squeeze harder, before replying to you "Nope, you call me Neptune now, I won't accept anything else!"

You stood even more dumbfounded then before. Very rarely did the Goddesses allow mortals to call them by their normal name alone, and that was almost always because that person was a close friend of theirs. You heard Purple He... Neptune call up to you from her perch on your chest. "Carry me to my room!"

You responded back "How do I get there Lady Neptune?"

Neptune responded back the directions, and you walked awkwardly out of the office, ignoring all the glares send at you by jealous co-workers. Neptune dropped from her perch on your chest when you entered the elevator in order to insert a key, before she circled around you and jumped on your shoulders, her natural strength giving her more than enough momentum to jump that high. You felt Neptunes thighs squeeze against the sides of your head, leaving you to blush and slam your mouth shut the rest of the way up.
