112222222222222222222222222222.content: What if our favorite navigator gets as obsessed with you as she usually is with money?
112222222222222222222222222222.title: Nami from One Piece

choices: She forces you into a make-out session
She is able to surpress the effects for now
1122222222222222222222222222221.content:
Nami groggily opened her eyes, confused as to what had actually happened to her. A very brief check made it obvious that she was tied tightly to a chair in some unknown location with a creepy black-haired man staring at her excitedly.

Damn it! A kidnapping! She shouldn’t have gone shopping all on her own!

“Mmmmph!” Her instinctive scream for help made the navigator painfully aware of the thick cloth that was currently cramped inside her mouth. And from the feeling of it, a big strap of tape was sealing her lips together as well. Bloody great.

“You finally woke up, Cat Burglar Nami, that is wonderful” her captor started amused. “It wouldn’t be nearly as much fun twisting your mind while you are unconscious.”

“Mmmph! Mmmh Mmmh Mph!” Nami protested angrily behind her gag.

“Ever since I first laid eyes on your wanted poster, I knew that I had to have you. And now, after all this time of planning and tracking, I finally got you right where I want you.”

The man slowly walked over to her, rubbing his gloved hands together in excitement. Everything about him basically screamed “crazy stalker”. And based on his words she was his main target.

“I ate a very interesting Devil Fruit” her captor explained with a sick grin all over his face. “With only one touch of my hand I can make people completely and utterly obsessed with whatever they are looking at in that moment. A ship, an apple, a book, another person, it doesn’t matter what it is. I can make them desire it more than anything else, I can make them go crazy and destroy everything in their path in order to obtain and keep the item they saw.”

Nami used his monologue to struggle against her bonds, but the rope work was really good. That guy definitely knew what he was doing and she didn’t like it one bit.

“I am wearing these gloves to prevent any accidental use of my powers. After all, I like to be in full control at all times.” With exaggerated movements the kidnapper slowly pulled off one of the gloves and waved his bare hand in front of her face. “I am making you mine, Cat Burglar Nami. One touch and you will be totally obsessed with me, I will become your new purpose in life, your one and only. All your struggles will be gone in an instant, replaced by the burning desire to stay with me forever. Can you already see it? Because I definitely can.”

Her captor erupted into an insane laughter, truly scaring the tied up pirate girl by now. Nami was convinced that he was not bluffing. She had enough experience to know how crazy Devil Fruit powers could be and that a single touch of his hand was most likely enough to rewrite her brain.

But every Devil Fruit had a weakness. That guy just said it himself. She would be obsessed with whatever she was looking at in that moment. So what if she looked at nothing? It was worth a try and there were not really many other options left. Taking a deep breath to calm herself down, she closed her eyes completely, allowing the darkness to take over her vision.

But her newfound confidence was quickly shattered as she heard the man speak to her again. “It is no use, my dear. My powers affect you even while your eyes are closed. In that case you simply get obsessed with the first thing you see after reopening them. And trust me on this one, I will make sure that it is me.”

Great. So she somehow had to keep her eyes closed until someone would miraculously show up to rescue her. Not very likely. But it couldn’t end like that. She was a proud member of the Strawhat Pirates, there was no way she was going down so easily. Not without a proper fight.

Summoning up all her strength, Nami renewed her struggles against the bonds, making the chair shake a bit in the process. Maybe it was because abandoning her vision had sharpened her other senses, but she was suddenly hit with the realization that one of the chair legs was shorter than the other ones by a tiny amount. That was all the opening she needed.

“Struggle all you want, in just a few more seconds you will be all mine.”

Nami ignored the creep, totally focused on shaking the chair as much as she can. It took her a few more attempts, but right before he could touch her she managed to create enough force to make the chair fall over.

She was hitting the floor with an acceptable loud crash. Sadly, neither her bonds nor the chair itself took any significant damage from the fall. But that would not stop her from even more struggling. As long as she kept her eyes closed, there was still a chance.

Nami could basically feel how her crazy captor slowly leaned over her, clearly enjoying her helplessness. “Game over, my precious Cat Burglar” he hissed into her ear right before his hand touched her upper arm, infecting her with his unique possession powers. Damn it!

“Hello? Is someone there?” a new voice suddenly reached her ears, filling the navigator with hope. The voice clearly came from further away, but it looked like someone somehow took notice of her crash and came to investigate.

“Seriously?” the kidnapper grunted in annoyance. She could hear hasty movements as well as two ripping sounds right before something sticky was pressed upon her closed eyes. It didn’t take a genius to realize that this creep had just taped her eyelids shut to prevent her from opening her eyes without his consent.

“Just give me another minute, I have to take care of some unwanted guest.”

Nami knew that this was her prime opportunity to try and free herself, but for some reason she was too curious to see how things would play out, so she put a stop to her futile attempts and instead listened closely to what was about to happen with the newcomer.

“Anyone there? I know I heard something…”

“Insolent brat! I will make you regret peeking around!”

The fighting noise was loud but also over quickly. Whoever won didn’t had any trouble taking out his opponent. After what felt like an eternity of silence to the tied up Stawhat member a quite weak “How… Who… are you…?” from her captor´s voice finally released the tension. The newcomer had won. She was about to get saved.

Relief flooded trough her entire body. It appeared like a fairy tale, the hero showing up just in the nick of time to save the damsel in distress from the crazy bad guy. Only that this right now was reality.

“I can´t believe it…” her saviour announced right after she heard him step into the room. “Good thing I trusted my gut and came here. Hold still, I am going to cut you free this instance.”

Whoever that guy was, he followed up his words with actions, and before Nami realized it the ropes were falling off and she could properly move her body again. In gentleman style he then helped her sitting up before carefully peeling off the tape from both her lips and eyes.

“What happened here? Are you all right?”

Spitting the cloth out of her mouth, Nami instinctively turned towards her saviour as she opened her eyes for the first time since she was affected by that particular Devil Fruit.

“Yes, thank you very much.”

As the rescued Strawhat navigator realized what she was doing, it was already far too late. The image of her saviour burned itself deep into her mind, together with a massive desire to be with him, to keep him, to crush anything and everything that would dare to stand between them.

Congratulations! Nami is now officially your Yandere!
1122222222222222222222222222221.title: Yandere Nami

1122222222222222222222222222222.content: What if the blonde Queen of Obelisk Blue becomes your yandere, turning Duel Academy upset done in the process?
1122222222222222222222222222222.title: Alexis Rhodes from YuGiOh GX

choices: Alexis takes the first turn of the duel
You get interrupted by a staff member
11222222222222222222222222222221.content:
You made it. You finally arrived at Duel Academy, the prestigious school for what was without a doubt the most important and influential card game to ever exist. Somehow you even managed to end up in the best of the three dorms, Obelisk Blue. It was a dream coming true.

Over your enormous excitement to be on the island and prove to everyone that you would be the next King of Games, you actually managed to miss the end of Chancellor Sheppard´s welcoming speech and quickly found yourself lost straight on day one. What a start...

“Do you need some help to get to our dorm? I can lead you there if you want to.”

You looked up to see a tall and beautiful girl with long blonde hair and hazel eyes. Her white and blue uniform clearly intentified her as an Obelisk student. Well, seems like your situation was a blessing in disguise as it would allow you to get to know one of cute females.

“Thank you, that would be very nice.”

You followed her lead as the two of you started a small innocent conversation. For some reason she was very interested in who you are and what playstyle you prefer. You answered honestly and asked several questions on your own, not knowing that Alexis already knew everything about you from the very beginning.

Ever since she first laid eyes on you during the examination duels, Alexis knew that she had to have you, so she gathered as much information as possible about your life. She prepared a dozen plans on how to quickly capture your heart at the start of the new semester, but never thought such a golden opportunity would present itself on the very first day.

“Alexis, are you sure we are going the right way?” you asked concerned as she led you deeper and deeper into the woods. You got too distracted by the conversation to notice it sooner.

“I actually want to convince myself first that you truly belong into Obelisk Blue” she replied and before you realized it, the charming blonde had suddenly turned around and activated her Duel Disk. “Let us have a duel to decide your worth. If you win I will not only lead you to our dorm, but agree to become your permanent guide and girlfriend. But if you lose you have to fulfill any request I have for the rest of the semester. Deal?”

This was ridiculous. Why would you ever agree to such crazy terms? Oh right, the dueling credo to never back down from a challenge. You didn’t want to break that on the first day at Duel Academy, did you? Well, here goes nothing…

“All right Alexis, I will teach you not to underestimate me. It´s time to duel.”
11222222222222222222222222222221.title: Welcome to Duel Academy

112222222222222222222222222222211.content:
“All right, Ladies first” Alexis started the duel in the middle of the woods. “I summon Etoile Cyber in attack mode.”

With that said, the hologram of an athletic brown-haired warrior lady in some sort of red bodysuit appeared on her side of the field.

Etoile Cyber 1200 ATK

“Next up I activate the spell card Terraforming to add one field spell from my deck directly to my hand. And I know exactly which one I want.”

A malicious grin spread across her cute face as she searched for the very special card that she put into her deck specifically for this duel. She didn’t even know such a card existed or why someone would feel the need to create it in the first place, but that didn’t matter right now. She managed to get her hands on this very unique spell and now she was going to use it to get her guy. He had no idea what was about to hit him.

“Behold! I activate the field spell Yandere Girl´s Paradise!”

The moment Alexis placed the card into her Duel Disk, a pink mist started to spread all across the surrounding area, creating a dome around them that trapped both duelists inside of it. Slowly but surely pictures formed on these new encircling mist walls, all of them showing you in different private situations as if they were taken from a stalker girl. Did those pics really exist or was it just an illusion from the card? Either way, it was creepy as hell.

“This marvellous field spell increases the ATK of all female monsters on the field by 500 points as well as making them unaffected by opposing monster effects” Alexis explained blissfully as her current warrior lady received a small power boost.

Etoile Cyber 1700 ATK

“Of course my field spell also has some other tricks available, but I don’t want to spoil all the surprises. No worries, you will find out in due time. For now, I set these two cards face down and end my turn.”

Ok, this duel just turned a lot tougher than you thought it would. If you play too carelessly, that mysterious field spell you have never heard of before could easily destroy you. On the other side, the quicker you finish Alexis off, the less opportunities she has to abuse it´s powers. Was it worth the risk?

Quickly forming a plan based on the opening hand, you started your first move.
112222222222222222222222222222211.title: The Yandere Duel kicks off

1122222222222222222222222222222221.content:
After returning to Universe 6, Kale, Caulifla, and Cabba began to teach others how to become Super Saiyans.

Kale still was pretty nervous and shy. Most didn't think she could become a super saiyan.

Those comments stopped the moment she became a Super Saiyan... and then entered the Legendary Super Saiyan state before attacking her former bullies.

So Saiyans listened when she taught.. or tried to. Shyness doesn't vanish in one day, after all.

You are Y/N, and never mocked Kale. You listened intently and did as she explained, briefly becoming a Super Saiyan. You make sure to shower her with complements, making her blush and look away.

However, when a girl complemented you, Kale's shy expression was replaced by a glare, one that said, 'I will kill you.'

When Caulifla saw you could become a Super Saiyan, she decided to test you in a spar with only Kale watching.

The spar was... interesting.

You tried to actually fight, but you kept tripping. Your kept winding up either groping Caulifla's ass or boobs, or wound up with your head in them.

At best, you were never hit by Caulifla.

After you got up from Caulifla for the tenth time, she said with a grin, "Interesting fightning style. What do you call it?"

"Uhn, I just learned how to throw a punch," You answered.

"Oh-ho! A fresh canvas! Mind if Kale and I take you under our wings?" Caulifla asked.

"Sure! I'd love to call you and Kale Senseis!" You happily exclaimed.

Looking over at Kale, Caulifla asked, "Kale! Want this guy as a student?"

Kale was surprised for a moment before pure glee came over his face and cheered, "Yes! Yes! Yes, Caulifla!"

Caulifla looked at you and said, "So, just tell your parents and we'll get started on your training."

"I... live alone. My parents died," You answered.

"Oh..." Caulifla uttered with surprise before grinning, "Even better...We'll move in with you!"

"Really?" You asked with enough glee to have stars appear in your eyes.

Caulifla put an arm around you and said, "Sure! It'll be an experience you'll never regret!"

After Caulifla rubbed her boobs against you, she released you. You said,"I'll go clean my home up right away!"

Once you left, Caulifla looked at Kale and said, "Let's make him ours, Kale."

"As in... our mate?" Kale nervously asked.

"Student, mate, husband, whatever. He needs to be ours, no one else's," Caulifla said with a serious expression.

Kale returned the serious look and nodded.

1122222222222222222222222222222222223.content: How about having the sadomasochistic Sheriff of Lynchwood be your yandere?
1122222222222222222222222222222222223.title: Nisha Kadam from Borderlands

11222222222222222222222222222222222231.content:
"Ugh," you grunt as you look over the bullet-riddled corpse of a bandit at your feet, simultaneously loading a fresh magazine into your rifle. "...not five steps from the station and I'm already being attacked by bandits."

Brick, the Slab King, asked you to do a few things for him in the bandit-infested town of Lynchwood. Things like robbing the bank, blowing up a train that transports Eridium, and fighting the sheriff of the town. So, y'know, nothing new to a badass Vault Hunter such as yourself.

Supposedly the Sheriff was, once upon a time, a Vault Hunter that helped bring Handsome Jack into power. She's also, apparently, Jack's girlfriend. Killing her won't bring you and the Crimson Raiders any closer to putting Jack in the dirt, but hey - it'll be a good fight either way.

Speaking of which, Brick wants you to scope out the town's bank. Best get to it.

Meanwhile, in northern Lynchwood

"Ha... what a productive day."

Her boots kicked up on the old hardwood desk, Nisha is relaxing after a long day of introducing some lawbreakers to the Lynchwood gallows. All the confidence in the world didn't matter when you have a noose wrapped around your neck, and Nisha was fond of watching people draw their last breath. The dark-skinned gunslinger has her wide-brimmed hat resting on her face to keep Pandora's sun from irritating her eyes.

A trio of knocks on Nisha's office door disturbs her brief moment of solace. She lets out a soft growl, instinctively reaching for the digistruct holster strapped to her right hip. Bandits wouldn't just casually knock on her door, and the only person brave and/or stupid enough to do so would be her deputy, Winger.

Placing her hat properly on her head, Nisha calls out, "Better not be wasting my time, Winger! What do you want?"

Winger enters, and Nisha can tell the deputy is nervous. Good. He knows his place.

"We've got word a Vault Hunter j-just arrived, ma'am - he's s-shootin' up Main Street as w-we speak!" Deputy Winger stutters out, looking like he'd rather be anywhere else but Nisha's office.

The dark-skinned gunslinger quirks an inquisitive eyebrow, then turns her gaze to the CCTV monitor on her desk. Sure enough, some merc - one with rugged facial features, she noted offhandedly - is gunning down bandits like there's no tomorrow. No doubt he's allied with the anti-Hyperion resistance. Aside from the Eridium train, nothing of value to Hyperion is in Lynchwood... so why would a lone Vault Hunter start shooting up her town?

'Ooooh, I know why he's out here trying to get my attention,' Nisha muses to herself with a grin, thoughts turning sinister and possessive. 'He obviously needs a woman who's loyal, unlike those sluts in Sanctuary.'

But how should Nisha go about making you hers?
11222222222222222222222222222222222231.title: Stirrin' up trouble (and obsessions).

1122222222222222222222222222222222223222.content: Surely, youre a TRUE believer in the Heart of the Cards, arent you?
1122222222222222222222222222222222223222.title: Yu-Gi-Oh's Dark Magician Girl

1122222222222222222222222222222222223222.content:
The duel for the Regional Championship was about to come to a close. With less than a thousand life-points remaining on both sides, your 2400 Attack point Jinzo alone facing down your opponent Ali's Great Beast Angra Mainyu with his 2800 Attack points, you were running out of exits. Your trump card, Dark Magician, had already taken a swan dive early and your hand is full of spell cards that woulda came in real handy for him!

But something deep down was telling you not to give up. Something deep down was telling you to wipe that prideful smirk off Ali's face. Despite losing your best cards, that spark of hope and willpower was still fighting strong. You didnt know what card you had left that could save you, but you put your faith in that spark (or as some refer to as 'The Heart of The Cards') and draw your next card.

'...WHAT?!'

You gazed down in disbelief at the card you just drawn. The Dark Magician Girl. A really really good card to pull right now. However, there's a slight issue.

You dont own a Dark Magician Girl. You NEVER owned a Dark Magician Girl! None of your backup decks contained Dark Magician Girls let alone the customized one you brought to the championship! How did this one end up in your deck? Did somebody sneak it in? Is it against the rules to have an undisclosed card you dont even own slipped into your deck during the competition? You dont know whether you should feel more worried that you found a card you dont own in your deck or that you broke a rule having a card you dont own in your deck!

“Brother, what is taking so long?!” Ali goaded you from the other side of the ring, “hurry up, already! Are you ready to surrender and admit defeat or do you wish to provide Angra Mainyu with another sacrifice?”
You decide to question this anomaly later and get back to the duel.
“Sorry Ali,” you regain your confidence, “I was just briefly stunned by the sheer beauty of the monster I'm about to summon to finish this duel!”
“Bring him then!” Ali demanded with pride, “he'll just be another stepping stone on my path of glorious conquest!”

“It's not a 'him', Ali!” you stated, “I sacrifice my Jinzo to summon the Dark Magician Girl!”
The image of Jinzo on the VR grid vanishes and it's place appeared a glowing occultish seal as a feminine figure emerged from it. A blonde-haired woman in blue armor with a seal broach in the middle, wearing a blue Dark Magician helmet and a pink skirt, and brandishing a scepter capable of casting dark magic to destroy her enemies! She spun around and you nearly lost yourself in the twinkle in her sparkling emerald green eyes before snapping out of it just in time to plan your attack. The useless spell cards in your hand just became detrimental.

“Heh, she certainly is a beauty, brother,” Ali laughs, “but she still pales in comparison to a Great Beast!”
“Hold on, I aint done yet, 'brother'!” you slap a spell card on the field, “I activate Magician's Scepter. This gives DMG an extra 500 Attack Point boost and raises her level to 7. Combined that with the 300 AP boost with my Dark Magician in the graveyard and both our monsters are evenly matched… that is until I activate this.”

Ali's arrogant grin disappeared as soon as he saw you activate the trap Resonance of Power. Thanks to DMG now being level 7, she gains an extra 800 AP boost!
“That puts her at 3600 attack points. You know what that means, Ali? Show him what it means, Dark Magician Girl!”

A strong surge of dark magical power enveloped her scepter and aimed it toward the great beast.
“NOOOOO!!!” Ali shouted in horror as his Angra Mainyu was caught in the explosion, leaving absolutely nothing behind in the smoke… and taking his remaining 800 life points with it! When the smoke finally cleared, the only things left in front of you in that ring were the Dark Magician Girl and the defeated Ali who had dropped to the floor lowering his head in utter shame. Geez, you didnt think he'd take losing THIS bad.

“WINNER AND THIS YEAR'S REGIONAL CHAMPION: [Y/N]!”
The crowd went wild for you. It was a proud day for you. All your hard work and training had finally paid off. You never felt so proud of yourself your whole life! Who cares if you won with a card you dont technically own and was mysteriously slipped into your deck? YOU WON!!!

However, just as you were beginning to savor your epic victory, something incredibly unusual happened. The Dark Magician Girl on the VR grid actually turned around and smiled at you. Then she clapped along with the audience for you! None of the duel monsters on the VR grid have EVER done something like this!

You blinked with your jaw dropping in disbelief just before her image disappears.
“D-D-DID YOU JUST SEE THAT?!”
“See what?” Ali groaned as he walked off with his head hung low, “my dreams of restoring the Great Persian Empire dashed to pieces? Yes, brother. I saw it clear as day...” What is his problem?!
Whatever it was, it wasnt as big as yours. The cheers from the audience seemed drowned out as you stared at your new Dark Magician Girl Card… who youre pretty sure wasnt winking in her portrait earlier.

Despite winning the championship, the anomaly bugged you all the way back to your hotel room. You couldnt sleep in preparation for the celebratory party tomorrow cuz of all the newbound stressed you developed. You spent hours sitting at a desk reviewing your decks, trying to remember when you ever picked up a DMG, but no such luck. No recollection whatsoever. Just looking at the card was making you uncomfortable.

The Duel Monster developers never made a winking Dark Magician Girl card as far as you know. Yet it's not fake, cuz the VR-grid wouldve detected counterfeits. Maybe it's a super rare card that was unreleased to the public? Even so, how did you manage to get your hands on it? Are you inadvertently breaking any laws just having it with you?

“Ugh...” you moan in frustration, “this is hopeless. I gotta go to bed.” You'll just have to ponder the magical mystery tomorrow. So after putting your decks away, brushing your teeth, and changing into your pjs, you shut off the light, hop into bed and close your eyes, too tired to even bother pulling the covers over.

...As a shadowy figure pulls the covers over you.
1122222222222222222222222222222222223222.title: Do You Believe in Magic?

Gift points will probably total 1000 if I at least somewhat liked the chapter, 500 if it's clear effort was really put into it, or maybe even 5k if any of the two below are added to with effort. Again, 300 word minimum still applies.

"Koneko from Highschool DxD" 
"Neptune from Hyper Dimension Neptunia." 





First things first, No males being yanderes. Just talking to a male in the series is fine, but I don't want any Males to start stabbing everyone because they love you.

EDIT: GUYS ARE FINE ONLY IF THEY'RE TRAPS (Characters like Gasper from DxD are fine and dandy, but still no regular guys)

Second Rule: You are a boy that has been raised in that world, what exactly you are is up to you, maybe a Nekoshou in the world of DxD or Garp's other son in One Piece. You could even make yourself one of the male characters in that universe, maybe even during the plot of the show.

Third Rule: Multiple yandere is fine, but I'd prefer that the story not have torture scenes, etc. Maybe a couple of girls kidnapping you, drugging you, maybe even buying you from your parents if they're rich enough in the series.

Fourth rule: I don't want choice chapters other than the picking of the girl. Which means Minimum of 300 words or your chapter will be deleted. I will inform you of this and maybe if I like how the chapter is, I'll edit it to be extended to the word limit, no trying to squeeze around this rule, I will be watching you

Fifth Rule: Use proper grammar and spelling. I will edit if the grammar issues aren't terrible, but I will delete chapters that talk like this
(Omgyour eadth rules UpToTiSi point ggoodo joobobo) That hurt me to write btw.

Sixth Rule: You may move onto other females, as long as they share the same fandom. I don't want Sakura from Naruto appearing in Highschool DxD.

Seventh Rule: Have fun uploading and follow all the other rules


Email me if you need any clarification for a rule or need to check if your chapter is good enough by the rules of the story.

Will add more rules later if need be, make sure to re-read rules every time you enter a chapter in

This story can include characters from cartoons, regular TV shows, anime or real life. So basically anything is ok
